headline: Biobanking Market Analysis and Forecast Report 2025-2035: Ethical and Legal Challenges in Biobanking - Navigating Consent and Privacy
summary: Driven by demand for personalized medicine and rising chronic diseases, the biobanking market faces ethical and regulatory challenges.
